page.title: 15ILFORD PARK POLISH HOME.
page.content: they could cook for themselves. The oldest person is 97 and the youngest is 32. They have a hospital and a surgery where doctors and dentists go and see people. They have two dining rooms one further away from the blocks for the people who can walk and the other one is for people who are disabled. They had a room with two looms and people were making table clothes.They have a concert hall, a stage and a lounge. Their favourite television programme is "Dallas". They have also got their own church, with their own Catholic priest.All the services are held in Polish and they are very proud that the Pope is also Polish. In the church is a black madonna, they say that it led them to safety. Displayed around the camp are pictures of the eagle (the national emblem)still with his crown on.
